game.name: Agent C
game.shortDescription: Agent C is the ultimate stealth survivor designed for tactical operations. This innovative character excels in infiltrating military bases, utilizing advanced stealth techniques to navigate through enemy lines undetected with the added capability of piloting a powerful helicopter.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Agent C is the ultimate stealth survivor designed for tactical operations. This innovative character excels in infiltrating military bases, utilizing advanced stealth techniques to navigate through enemy lines undetected with the added capability of piloting a powerful helicopter.
